participant_1.background:
I met my husband at a cosplay event and we've been together ever since.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
my husband was a career soldier.
I started my own business and now work from home, which allows me to take my morning walks to the beach more often.
I played field hockey and soccer with my friends and ate a big cake.

participant_2.background:
I think the most difficult thing I've ever done was to leave my home country and move to a new one.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
i have went to mexico 4 times this year.

content.text: Hey there. I'm a big fan of cosplay. I met my husband at a cosplay event and we've been together ever since.
That's so awesome! I've always wanted to try cosplaying, but I'm not very creative.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun to dress up as your favorite character and meet other people who are into the same things you are.
I'm not sure where I would even start.
There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started. There are also a lot of cosplay groups on social media where you can connect with other people who are into it.
That's a good idea. I'll have to check it out.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch funny and lighthearted shows, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries. I also enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
Those all sound like great ways to relax. I love reading too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series. I've read them all multiple times. I also love the Hunger Games series.
Those are both great series! I've read them both too.
They're so good! I also like to read historical fiction and romance novels.
I've never been a big fan of romance novels, but I do like historical fiction.
They're both great genres. I'm glad you're enjoying them.
